text: Study the given program and answer the given questions. (2) DECLARE SUB SUM(N) CLS INPUT "Enter any number"; N CALL SUM(N) END SUB SUM(N) WHILE N > 0 R = N MOD 10 T = T + R N = N \ 10 WEND PRINT "The Sum of individual digit is"; T END SUB Questions:​
